title: The State Of Labor And The Economy In 2022
itunes:title: The State Of Labor And The Economy In 2022
description:
Sarah House, Senior Economist at Wells Fargo Securities, discusses the economy and labor on jobs day. Russell Price, Chief Economist at Ameriprise Financial, discusses jobs, markets, investing, and jobs day. Tom Gimbel, Founder & CEO of the LaSalle Network, talks about the latest jobs numbers and the state of employment in the US. Jeffrey Cleveland, Director and Chief Economist for Payden & Rygel, talks about inflation and labor. Hosted by Paul Sweeney and Lisa Abramowicz.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
